constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension and installation of 2no. rooflighhts to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

For the avoidance of any doubt, the applicant is advised that this planning permission does not override the requirements of planning permission ref:  17/12464/FUL or regularise any breach of condition associated with that permission (such as with the approved Landscaping Scheme). Any breach of condition associated with planning permission ref:  17/12464/FUL  would need to be regularised by way of a planning application specific to planning permission ref:  17/12464/FUL.
